cons: Adverse effects from the ingestion of parsley oil include headache, giddiness, loss of balance, convulsions, and renal damage.
description: It helps to controlling blood cholesterol and may offer protection against free radical-mediated injury and cancers.
It controls blood sugar levels in diabetics.
It helps to prevent age-related macular degeneration (ARMD) in the retina (eye) in the elderly population through its antioxidant and ultraviolet light filtering functions.
name: Parsley
pros: It helps to controlling blood cholesterol and may offer protection against free radical-mediated injury and cancers.
It controls blood sugar levels in diabetics.
It helps to prevent age-related macular degeneration (ARMD) in the retina (eye) in the elderly population through its antioxidant and ultraviolet light filtering functions.
If you are pregnant, taking high doses of parsley can do more harm than good, so take in moderation.
